actions.text: Mr. Gephardt asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: Waiving certain enrollment requirements with respect to any reconciliation bill or continuing resolution for the remainder of the One Hundred First Congress.

summary.text: Waives provisions of Federal law with respect to the printing (on parchment or otherwise) of the enrollment of any reconciliation bill or continuing resolution of the 101st Congress to be presented to the President. Requires the Committee on House Administration to certify the enrollment of such bill or joint resolution as a true enrollment. Sets forth procedures for subsequent preparation and certification of a printed enrollment of such bill or joint resolution if it is enacted.

titles.title: Waiving certain enrollment requirements with respect to any reconciliation bill or continuing resolution for the remainder of the One Hundred First Congress.
